00052     SceneManager::SceneManager(SceneManager::SceneManagerType ManagerType)
00053     {
00054         Ogre::SceneType Type;
00055         switch (ManagerType)
00056         {
00057             case Generic:
00058                 Type = Ogre::ST_GENERIC;
00059                 break;
00060             case Exterior:
00061                 Type = Ogre::ST_EXTERIOR_FAR;
00062                 break;
00063             case ExteriorRealFar:
00064                 Type = Ogre::ST_EXTERIOR_REAL_FAR;
00065                 break;
00066             case Interior:
00067                 Type = Ogre::ST_INTERIOR;
00068                 break;
00069             default:
00070                 Type = Ogre::ST_GENERIC;
00071         }
00072         OgreManager = Ogre::Root::getSingleton().createSceneManager(Type);
00073     }
00074 
00075     SceneManager::~SceneManager()
00076     {
00077         for( unsigned int x=0 ; x < Lights.size() ; x++ )
00078         {
00079             delete Lights[x];
00080         }
00081         Lights.clear();
00082         for( unsigned int x=0 ; x < Particles.size() ; x++ )
00083         {
00084             delete Particles[x];
00085         }
00086         Particles.clear();
00087         for( unsigned int x=0 ; x < WorldNodes.size() ; x++ )
00088         {
00089             delete WorldNodes[x];
00090         }
00091         WorldNodes.clear();
00092         Ogre::Root::getSingleton().destroySceneManager(OgreManager);
00093     }
00094

00097     }

00101     }

00103     void SceneManager::CreateSkyPlane(Plane& SkyPlane, String& Material, String& Group, Real Scale, Real Tiling, bool DrawFirst, Real Bow, int XSegments, int YSegments)
00104     {
00105         this->OgreManager->setSkyPlane(true, SkyPlane.GetOgrePlane(), Material, Scale, Tiling, DrawFirst, Bow, XSegments, YSegments, Group);
00106     }

00109     {
00110         this->OgreManager->setSkyPlane(false, Ogre::Plane(), "");

00139     Light* SceneManager::CreateLight(const String& Name)
00140     {
00141         Light* light = new Light(this->OgreManager->createLight(Name), this);
00142         Lights.push_back(light);
00143         return light;
00144     }
00145 
00146     Light* SceneManager::GetLight(const String& Name)
00147     {
00148         if(Lights.empty())
00149             return 0;
00150         for( std::vector<Light*>::iterator it = Lights.begin() ; it != Lights.end() ; it++ )
00151         {
00152             if( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00153             {
00154                 return (*it);
00155             }
00156         }
00157         return 0;
00158     }
00159 
00160     Light* SceneManager::GetLight(Whole Index)
00161     {
00162         return Lights[Index];
00163     }
00164 
00165     Whole SceneManager::GetNumLights()
00166     {
00167         return Lights.size();
00168     }
00169 
00170     void SceneManager::DestroyLight(Light* light)
00171     {
00172         if(Lights.empty())
00173             return;
00174         for( std::vector<Light*>::iterator it = Lights.begin() ; it != Lights.end() ; it++ )
00175         {
00176             if( light == (*it) )
00177             {
00178                 delete (*it);
00179                 Lights.erase(it);
00180                 return;
00181             }
00182         }
00183     }

00185     ParticleEffect* SceneManager::CreateParticleEffect(const String& Name, const String& Template)
00186     {
00187         ParticleEffect* Particle = new ParticleEffect(this->OgreManager->createParticleSystem(Name, Template), this);
00188         Particles.push_back(Particle);
00189         return Particle;
00190     }

00192     ParticleEffect* SceneManager::GetParticleEffect(const String& Name)
00193     {
00194         if(Particles.empty())
00195             return 0;
00196         for( std::vector<ParticleEffect*>::iterator it = Particles.begin() ; it != Particles.end() ; it++ )
00197         {
00198             if( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00199             {
00200                 return (*it);
00201             }
00202         }
00203         return 0;
00204     }

00216     void SceneManager::DestroyParticleEffect(ParticleEffect* particleeffect)
00217     {
00218         if(Particles.empty())
00219             return;
00220         for( std::vector<ParticleEffect*>::iterator it = Particles.begin() ; it != Particles.end() ; it++ )
00221         {
00222             if( particleeffect == (*it) )
00223             {
00224                 delete (*it);
00225                 Particles.erase(it);
00226                 return;
00227             }
00228         }
00229     }

00232     {

00236     WorldNode* SceneManager::CreateOrbitingNode(const String& Name, Vector3 Target, Vector3 RelativeLoc, bool AutoTrack)
00237     {
00238         Ogre::SceneNode* OgreCNode = OgreManager->createSceneNode(Name + "C");
00239         OgreManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(OgreCNode);
00240         OgreCNode->setPosition(Target.GetOgreVector3());
00241         Ogre::SceneNode* OgreONode = OgreManager->createSceneNode(Name);
00242         OgreCNode->addChild(OgreONode);
00243         OgreONode->setPosition(RelativeLoc.GetOgreVector3());
00244         if(AutoTrack)
00245         {
00246             OgreONode->setAutoTracking(true, OgreCNode);
00247         }
00248         WorldNode* PhysONode = new WorldNode(OgreONode, this);
00249         PhysONode->SetType(WorldNode::Orbit);
00250         WorldNodes.push_back(PhysONode);
00251         return PhysONode;
00252     }
00253 
00254     WorldNode* SceneManager::CreateStandNode(const String& Name, Vector3 LookAt, Vector3 Location)
00255     {
00256         Ogre::SceneNode* OgreNode = OgreManager->createSceneNode(Name);
00257         OgreManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(OgreNode);
00258         OgreNode->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00259         OgreNode->lookAt(LookAt.GetOgreVector3(), Ogre::Node::TS_WORLD);
00260         WorldNode* PhysNode = new WorldNode(OgreNode, this);
00261         PhysNode->SetType(WorldNode::Stand);
00262         WorldNodes.push_back(PhysNode);
00263         return PhysNode;
00264     }
00265 
00266     WorldNode* SceneManager::GetNode(const String& Name)
00267     {
00268         if(WorldNodes.empty())
00269             return 0;
00270         for( std::vector<WorldNode*>::iterator it = WorldNodes.begin() ; it != WorldNodes.end() ; it++ )
00271         {
00272             if( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00273             {
00274                 WorldNode* node = (*it);
00275                 return node;
00276             }
00277         }
00278         return 0;
00279     }
00280 
00281     WorldNode* SceneManager::GetNode(Whole Index)
00282     {
00283         return WorldNodes[Index];
00284     }
00285 
00286     Whole SceneManager::GetNumNodes()
00287     {
00288         return WorldNodes.size();
00289     }
00290 
00291     Whole SceneManager::GetNumStandNodes()
00292     {
00293         if(WorldNodes.empty())
00294             return 0;
00295         Whole Num = 0;
00296         for( std::vector<WorldNode*>::iterator it = WorldNodes.begin() ; it != WorldNodes.end() ; it++ )
00297         {
00298             if( WorldNode::Stand == (*it)->GetType() )
00299             {
00300                 Num++;
00301             }
00302         }
00303         return Num;
00304     }
00305 
00306     Whole SceneManager::GetNumOrbitNodes()
00307     {
00308         if(WorldNodes.empty())
00309             return 0;
00310         Whole Num = 0;
00311         for( std::vector<WorldNode*>::iterator it = WorldNodes.begin() ; it != WorldNodes.end() ; it++ )
00312         {
00313             if( WorldNode::Orbit == (*it)->GetType() )
00314             {
00315                 Num++;
00316             }
00317         }
00318         return Num;
00319     }
00320 
00321     void SceneManager::DestroyNode(WorldNode* node)
00322     {
00323         if(WorldNodes.empty())
00324             return;
00325         for( std::vector<WorldNode*>::iterator it = WorldNodes.begin() ; it != WorldNodes.end() ; it++ )
00326         {
00327             if( node == (*it) )
00328             {
00329                 delete (*it);
00330                 WorldNodes.erase(it);
00331                 return;
00332             }
00333         }
00334     }
